name: Wizzy TicTac Boxes
description:
Game Made For Mini Jam 101 - TO PLAY AT FULLSCREEN.

You are a wizard in a castle with the power to control with magic power the crates near to him.

But you are not an expert wizard, so you will not have so much time using your power.

Use Mouse to choose the crate you want to move dragging it.

Use AD to move and the SpaceBar to jump.

Keep an eye on the magic time you have on the top left side of the room.

Interact pressing E.

Restart the level holding R.

Don't try to "fly"/cheat standing on a crate that you are dragging, it will push you out.

If you think there is a bug, it is not, it's only broken magic ;)))

And last but not least, use your brain.

(be greedy like every wizard!!).

P.s if you don't understand some part of the game then comment it that We will try to explain to you things that are not explained.

Credit and Thanks:

Development Team: Patrizio Pesce (PhantomHistory) And Antonio Rocco

Free assets used:

Wizard: https://0x72.itch.io/dungeontileset-ii

Tileset, Gems and Lever: https://bakudas.itch.io/generic-dungeon-pack

Main Menu Background: https://brullov.itch.io/2d-platformer-asset-pack-castle-of-despair

Sound Effects: https://mattflat.itch.io/rts-and-fps-sound-effects-asset-pack

Music: https://dos88.itch.io/dos-88-music-library

Jump Sound: https://simon-develop.itch.io/jump-sound-100-free

Key: https://cazwolf.itch.io/caz-pixel-keyboard

Font: https://tinyworlds.itch.io/free-pixel-font-thaleah

Wood Crate and Lava: https://essssam.itch.io/rocky-roads

Cursors: https://kicked-in-teeth.itch.io/point
